org.mule.modules.valomnia.client.impl

Class AbstractValomniaClient<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.valomnia.client.impl.AbstractValomniaClient<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericValomniaClientImpl

    public abstract class AbstractValomniaClient<T>
extends Object
    Base class for client service . The class handles: base URL creation creation of the Http(Post/Get) read response from input HttpResponse string Json-formated parsing to object Java Map parsing to String Json-formated
